thread.title: Broadcom cuts Qualcomm bid by $3 per share

title: Broadcom cuts Qualcomm bid by $3 per share
text:
Broadcom cuts Qualcomm bid by $3 per share 9:10pm GMT - 01:27 
Broadcom lowered its takeover offer for chipmaker Qualcomm to $79 per share from $82 to account for Qualcomm's sweetened offer for NXP Semiconductors. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Broadcom lowered its takeover offer for chipmaker Qualcomm to $79 per share from $82 to account for Qualcomm's sweetened offer for NXP Semiconductors. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
